author: Garret Tanner
comment: Looks beautiful on my Moto 360. I like that it changes face themes each day. The only minor complaint I have is that on some of the face themes, the contrast between the background and the hands is low which can make it hard to tell where the hands are.
title: Beautiful watch face.

author: Sean Van
comment: Not too shabby. Stylish, simple, elegant. Good color combos, and fun that it changes daily. Would be nice to have the ability to pick which one I wanted to use, though. There are some that I like more than others, and would enjoy sticking with them more. Otherwise, not a bad face at all!

author: Victor Kaiser-Pendergrast
comment: Wish there was an option to make the watch hands dark though, or to pick a darker background - it's not too easy to see in the sun sometimes.
title: Looks Good

author: Justin Dykstra
comment: The green one does not fit my watch, but i absolutely love this app. Seriously, get it.
title: Please make it so we can chose watch face.

author: Christopher Hayden
comment: But the fact that I can't change/customize the face and dials kind of sucks. I don't want pink, so I'll change my whole watch face until the next day basically. Allow users to change features
title: Nice watch face

author: Bruno Larogian
comment: Stuck on golden face
title: Won't let me change the colors

comment: Now if Rolex, IWC, Patek Phillipe et al could do something similar we could all have a good time 😃
title: Nice one...

comment: Everyday a change color automatic love it
title: I love on LG G R WATCH

author: Anthony Greenwood
comment: Love the match faces just wish i could change it myself...but then it would be weds daily
title: My favorite

comment: Wouldn't show up at first on Zenwatch, but works now. Nice design.
title: Looks good on Zenwatch

comment: But make an option to change faces daily or set a fixed one.

comment: All designs are amazing just one issue it should provide design selection manually :)
title: Beautiful

author: Ra Cofi
comment: I like

author: Paul Franek
comment: Gorgeous faces that change daily.

author: Matthew Majeika
comment: Looks very nice. Seems like the hourglass timer is going up - is it supposed to be going down? Could also be cool to allow for customization as well as the default automatic new style every day. Overall, very well done.

author: Shawn Altorio
comment: Having an option to have the watch face change daily is fine, but if really like to choose the colors myself and stick with them if I prefer. Otherwise, quite nice.
title: Want to choose my own colors

author: Kit Stephenson
comment: What's the point of customizing your watch faces if you can't pick the color of the watch face?!
title: Can't change watchface colors!

author: David Nurbin
comment: The watch looks good. I would rate it 5 stars if I had the option to choose the colors, rather than it choosing for me..  The problems that other users have with the watch appearing would want to check something that I have not seen anywhere, but found out on my own, since I have a lot of watchfaces installed:  It seems that the watchface handler in the Android Wear app can only handle 60 wathcfaces. Once it passed that for me, no new faces would appear. You may have to delete watchfaces, then re-install the one you want for it to appear. That fixed the issue for me.

author: Dean Dillman
comment: Doesn't show up in Android Wear after installing it. I have uninstalled it and reinstalled it and restarted my phone.

comment: Not showing up in android wear.

comment: Does not show watchface on moto 360 I'm using the G3
